name: reaper-cloth
effect: Held by Dusclops: Evolves the holder into Dusknoir when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Dusclops: Holder evolves into Dusknoir.

flavor_text.black-white: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
